name: Uncovered (Panini Cupcake)
description:
Playable with mouse and or keyboard.

How to play:

-Select a person on the bed (Press the down arrow to deselect)

-Click on one of the directional arrows to make them:

-Roll if they are not covered by a sheet

-Pull sheets over themselves if they are adjacent to a sheet

-Pull sheets and tuck into them if covered by the edge of the sheet

-People tucked in will be moved with the sheets if they are pulled, unless another person blocks them.

{The mechanics are explained in game, and hopefully you can figure them out)

The turning marker signifies someone has rolled over one, and the  X marker signifies someone has rolled over twice.

Pressing space restarts the level, pressing escape closes the game

I made this for the game jam as a joke before discovering unity games weren't allowed. I might add more levels if people show interest. 10 levels currently.
